8:
n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    count = 0
    while i < j:
        if a[i] + a[j] <= 3:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        else:
            j -= 1
        count += 1
    if i == j:
        count += 1
    print(count)
9:
n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    i = 0
    j = n-1
    count = 0
    while i < j:
        if a[i] == a[j]:
            count += 1
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        elif a[i] < a[j]:
            count += 1
            i += 1
        else:
            count += 1
            j -= 1
    if a[i] == a[j]:
        count += 1
    print(count)
11:
T = int(input())
    for _ in range(T):
        N = int(input())
        A = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        max_sum = 0
        max_sum_index = 0
        for i in range(N):
            if sum(A[:i+1]) > max_sum:
                max_sum = sum(A[:i+1])
                max_sum_index = i+1
        print(max_sum_index)
12:
q = int(input())
    for i in range(q):
        c, m, x = map(int, input().split())
        print(min(c, m, x))
